item.title: #16 Epic battle! -
item.description:
Shownotes and Links

  • Imobilul în Silicon Valley scade în preț - https://vc.ru/migrate/150844-ceny-na-zhile-v-kremnievoy-doline-stali-padat-iz-za-udalenki-specialisty-stali-razezzhatsya-po-bolee-dostupnym-shtatam
  • Log in în Oculus acum cu Facebook account - https://www.oculus.com/blog/a-single-way-to-log-into-oculus-and-unlock-social-features/
  • Kotlin 1.4 - https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2020/08/new-language-features-and-more-in.html
  • Mozilla concediază 250 angajați - https://blog.mozilla.org/blog/2020/08/11/changing-world-changing-mozilla/
  • Rob Pike’s 5 rules of programming - http://users.ece.utexas.edu/~adnan/pike.html
  • Epic vs Apple - https://www.theverge.com/2020/8/14/21369622/epic-ceo-tim-sweeney-apple-fortnite-lawsuit-ban-basic-freedoms-developers
  • Savanții hărțuiți de hackeri în suma de 118 BTC- https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2020-08-19/ucsf-hack-shows-evolving-risks-of-ransomware-in-the-covid-era

item.title: #13 Antitirust them all! -
item.description:
Shownotes and Links

  • Mozilla folosește Push Notification în scopuri politice - https://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=53427
  • CTO Intel pleacă, nu știm când vom vedea procesoare noi - https://www.theverge.com/2020/7/27/21340993/intel-hardware-chief-venkata-murthy-renduchintala-leaving
  • Qualcomm s-au înțeles cu Huawei la ceva fără ca Trump să știe - https://www.wsj.com/articles/qualcomm-inks-licensing-deal-with-huawei-despite-u-s-china-tensions-11596059709
  • Serviciile Online Garmin au căzut din cauza unui ransomeware - https://www.t3.com/news/garmin-outage-garmin-connect-subsystems
  • Meow - https://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=53438
  • Google vrea M:N threads în Linux - https://lore.kernel.org/lkml/20200722234538.166697-1-posk@posk.io/
  • Ruby va avea tipuri? - https://developer.squareup.com/blog/the-state-of-ruby-3-typing/
  • Audiența Antitrust în congresul american - https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/28/technology/amazon-apple-facebook-google-antitrust-hearing.html
  • Awesome Github profiles - https://github.com/kautukkundan/Awesome-Profile-README-templates
  • No tech debt, it’s unhedged call option - https://www.higherorderlogic.com/2010/07/23/bad-code-isnt-technical-debt-its-an-unhedged-call-option/

item.title: #11 Money -
item.description:
Shownotes and Links

  • 1:09 Mai multe account-uri mari Twitter au fost sparte. (https://www.theverge.com/2020/7/15/21326200/elon-musk-bill-gates-twitter-hack-bitcoin-scam-compromised)
  • 4:54 Spotify oficial în Moldova. (https://www.spotify.com/md-en/premium/?checkout=false)
  • 7:44 Polonia include jocul This War of Mine în programul școlar. (https://notesfrompoland.com/2020/06/18/poland-puts-computer-game-this-war-of-mine-on-school-reading-list/)
  • 12:26 iOS Facebook SDK bug. Tinder nu se pornea :// (https://github.com/facebook/facebook-ios-sdk/issues/1427)
  • 16:21 Rust în Linux Kernel. (https://lkml.org/lkml/2020/7/10/1261)
  • 24:47 Amazon cumpără Zoox, în stil special :) (https://www.reuters.com/article/us-amazon-com-zoox-exclusive/exclusive-amazon-plans-at-least-100-million-to-keep-zoox-talent-after-1-3-billion-deal-idUSKBN24A3C8)
  • 32:21 De ce programatorii primesc așa bani mari?
